倫

Значения

Мораль, этика

Мнемоника

Правила отношений между людьми 亻, закреплённые на письме 侖.

Варианты

伦

倫理 [ lún lǐ ]: ethics
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 亻 [ rén ] man, person; people

heisig_chinese_memo: Mr. T talks about ethics and human relationships at the academic conference. "I pity the fool who gets caught plagarizing someone else's stuff!".
heisig_constituent: ethics, person, post-it note, meeting, scrapbook, glass canopy, hood, flowers
koohiiStory1: Mr. T talks about ethics at the academic conference. "I pity the fool who gets caught plagarizing someone else´s stuff!".
koohiiStory2: Mr. T has no ethics at the scrapbooking convention. He´ll do whatever it takes to beat all those ladies.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A leader puts their hat on the ground next to a bookshelf. This is a test in ethics.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: People hang around the bookshelf, and the leader wants to see if anyone will steal the hat or not. That's why its a test of ethics.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: To test your ethics even more, the leader puts down a ring (りん) as well.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Now we'll really see how everyone's ethics are. Will they turn in the ring to lost in found? will they ignore it? Will they steal it?
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), ｜, 亅 (зазубрина), 化 (превращаться), 个 (китайский счётный суффикс), 冊 (том)
Ru_trainchinese: lún: (графема) человеческие отношения, этика; логическая последовательность, порядок; быть равным, соответствовать
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the thinking (侖) man (亻) has principles
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Mr. T becomes a lifeguard because he believes there is no better way of starting strong human relationships than saving a drowning person.

①輩，類：無與倫比。不倫不類。
②人與人之間的關係：人倫。天倫。倫常。倫理。
③條理，次序：倫次。倫類(ａ．條理；b．同類)。
④姓氏。

倫字的基本解释

倫
lún
见“伦”。

倫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lún］
［《廣韻》力迍切，平諄，來。］
“伦1”的繁体字。
(1)辈；类。
(2)引申为相类；等比。
(3)条理，顺序。
(4)指顺其理，使之条理化。
(5)道理，义理。
(6)专指人与人之间的道德关系。
(7)首领。
(8)通“掄”。选择。参见“倫黨”。
(9)姓。唐有伦元庆。见《通志·氏族四》。

倫字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　倫； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页109第03
【唐韻】力迍切【韻會】【正韻】龍春切，?音淪。常也。【書·洪範】彝倫攸敘。　又類也。【禮·曲禮】儗人必于其倫。　又義也。【禮·祭統】夫祭有十倫焉。又【周禮·冬官考工記】析幹必倫。【註】順其理也。　又比也。【儀禮·卽夕】凡絞紟用布，倫如朝服。【禮·中庸】毛猶有倫。【疏】毛雖細物，猶有形體可比也。　又等也。【前漢·甘延壽傳】投石超距，絕於等倫。　又擇也。【儀禮·少牢饋食禮】雍人倫膚九，實于一鼎。【註】擇其至美者。　又姓。伶倫之後。

倫字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

暂无。

Lun
Basic explanation of words
Lun
lún
See "lun".
Lun
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lún］
["Guangyun" forcefully cut, smooth, come. ]
Traditional characters of "伦1".
(1) Generation; class.
(2) Extended to be similar; equal ratio.
(3) Order and order.
(4) It means to follow the rules and make it organized.
(5) Reason, justice.
(6) It refers specifically to the moral relationship between people.
(7) The leader.
(8) Through "抡". select. See "Lun Party".
(9) Last name. Tang Youlun Yuanqing. See "Tongzhi·Clan IV".
Lun

lún
вм. 伦
Radicals: ｲ, 一, 冊  (leader, ground, bookshelf, hat)
Meaning Mnemonic
A leader puts their hat on the ground next to a bookshelf. This is a test in ethics.
People hang around the bookshelf, and the leader wants to see if anyone will steal the hat or not. That's why its a test of ethics.
Reading Mnemonic
To test your ethics even more, the leader puts down a ring (りん) as well.
Now we'll really see how everyone's ethics are. Will they turn in the ring to lost in found? will they ignore it? Will they steal it?
